Articles.Content: so I am just starting out in KSP and I have no fuel tank how I get science for fuel tank

There are simple things you can do such as land a rocket anywhere and r-click on it to take a "crew report" for science. After a few of those you can buy fuel tank technology. 

Or do you mean you can't figure out how to take off at all? At the start of a game, the only engine you have is a small solid fuel part that is a combination fuel container and vessel pusher. Put one of those under the cabin and a parachute on top, and put them in separate stages so they don't both activate at the same time. Fly it and collect crew reports and stuff. 

And welcome to the forum.
